segments.text: These are my roses . The roses have been in flower for a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The garden looks lovely when the roses are in bloom . You must have a lot of pleasure in planting flowers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you are right . I love flowers and hence have taken to growing them . I take care of my flowers every day as if they are my good friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You did a good job . But I got tired of working in the garden .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . People who don't understand the nature of flowers won't be able to grow them well . I can help you learn more if you want to plant flowers one day . In this way you need not be afraid of your own sweet flower-garden's being neglected .
segments.speaker: S2
